name: Santa Time v0.01
description:
This game are full whit end and credits :) but are whit bugs  little bugs i hope jeje

It is Santa's first year in the toy business but something has happened, a toy dealer has stolen a lot of merchandise that Santa must recover today, remembering his old days when he was a great military man, he must fulfill his mission and recover the Christmas ! Do you think you can help him !?

The game are maked the style pico8

BE COOL IF YOU DONATE ME! sorry bad English 

You can help me donate for i create more games before

AND I'M SORRY FOR MY WORK I DON'T HAVE A TIME FOR PUBLISH GAME 

BUT IT'S TIME YHEA!

Controls

BUTTON A = K

BUTTON B = J

BUTTON UP = W

BUTTON DOWN = S

BUTTON LEFT = A

BUTTON RIGHT = D

BUTTON START = E

BUTTON F12 = SCREEN SHOOT DEMO

BUTTON F8  = EXIT ALL GAME

SORRY THE INSTRUCTION CONTROLS NOT ARE IN GAME
